tool_description: Generates price alerts and notifications based on threshold conditions and target prices.
error_messages: Invalid alert type: Use one of [price_drop, price_increase, target_reached, percentage_change].
Missing threshold: percentage_threshold required for percentage_change alert type.
Missing target price: target_price required for target_reached alert type.
Invalid threshold range: percentage_threshold must be between 1 and 50.
Invalid price values: current_price and target_price must be positive numbers.
Conflicting parameters: Cannot use both target_price and percentage_threshold simultaneously.
usage: Specify product_id, current_price, and alert_type. For percentage_change alerts, include percentage_threshold. For target_reached alerts, include target_price.

alert_triggered.description: Whether an alert condition was met
